verses.1: Zuau genin mihai hihna sangin citakin zawn khiukheuna hoih zaw hi.
verses.2: Thu thei lopi-in lawp luatna hoih lo a, mawk nawh tatna in lungkhamna piangsak thei hi.
verses.3: Mi pawl khat in amauʼ hai tatna hangin gimna a ngah hi napi-in Topa ngawhin mawk heh uh hi.
verses.4: Mihaute in lawm mu thuahthuah a, mizawngte in a neihsun teng nangawn khah suahsuah uh hi.
verses.5: Thuman gen lo teci in gim tuak pelmawh dinga, zuaugen mi suakta lo ding hi.
verses.6: A cingh mihau paʼ maipha ngah ding ki-ut ciat a, na a piak mi khempeuh ama lawm ahi hi.
verses.7: Mi khempeuh in a sanggam zawng pa uh mudah ciat ahih manin a lawmte in a tai satna a thu lamdang hi lo hi.
verses.8: Pilna a zong pa in ama phattuam nading a zong hi a, thu a thei mipaʼ sepna maavang ding hi.
verses.9: Thuman lo teci in gim tuak pelmawh dinga, zuaugen mi in sihna thuak ding hi.
verses.10: Mihaite a nop lua-in a nuntak ding kilawm lo a, silate in mi liante a uk ding kilawm lo zaw lai hi.
verses.11: Pilna in mi lungduaisak a, miʼ hong hehsaknate kiphawkmawh bawlna in minthanna ahi hi.
verses.12: Kumpipaʼ hehna humpinelkai hawk bangin lauhuai a, ama pahtakna lopa tunga daitui taak bangin deihhuai hi.
verses.13: Tapa hai pen a paʼ lungkhamna hi a, zi phunphun pen a theu thei lo guahciin tawh kibang hi.
verses.14: Inn le neihsate pen pateʼ tung panin a kiluah hi a, zi pil ahihleh Topa bek in hong pia thei hi.
verses.15: A thadahte lumlum a, a mawk omte a gil kial hi.
verses.16: Thukham a zuite a khansau dinga, thukham a zui lote si ding hi.
verses.17: Mizawngte tungah a piate in Topaʼ tungah a pia hi a, Topa in a cingin amaute tungah lohkik ding hi.
verses.18: Thu hong man theih lai-in na ta thuhilh in; na hilh kei leh a siat nading a deih na hi hi.
verses.19: Migilo pa ama thuak ding gimna mah thuaksak zaw in. Hon khia lecin na hotkhiatkik zelzel kul ding hi.
verses.20: Thu kigente ngai-in hong kihilhte mang lecin mai lamah na pil ding hi.
verses.21: Mihingʼ ngaihsutna ah thu tampi om a, ahi zongin Topaʼ deihna tawh a kituakte bek kimang ding hi.
verses.22: Duhhopna pen mindaina hi a, zuaugen pa hihna sangin mizawng hihna hoih zaw lai hi.
verses.23: Topa a zahtakte a khansau a, lungkim takin nuamsa-in om uh a, siatna bangmah tuak kha lo uh hi.
verses.24: A thadah mi in a khut tawh ankuang sawk sukin a kam sungah a tut tohkik ding nangawn ut lo liang hi.
verses.25: Thu thei lote in satna bek tawh pilna ngah zo a, thungaihsun theite in taina lel tawh pilna ngah zo uh hi.
verses.26: A pa nawt gawpin a nu a not khia tapa pen zumna le mindaina a piangsak tapa ahi hi.
verses.27: Thuhilhna a mang nuam lo tapa pen pilna a thei kha lo ding tapa ahi hi.
verses.28: Mi a susia nuam teci in thuman gen nuam lo a, migilote in gitloh tatna nuamsa uh hi.
verses.29: Mi a thusim lote in ciangduai thuak uh a, mihaite in satna thuak uh hi.
